summary: Martin Chalfie is a biochemist from the United States.
full_text: Roger Yonchien Tsien  is an American biochemist. He is a professor at the Department of Chemistry and Biochemistry, University of California, San Diegoand was awarded the 2008 Nobel Prize in chemistry "for his discovery and development of the green fluorescent protein  with two other chemists: Martin Chalfie of Columbia University and Osamu Shimomura of Boston University and Marine Biological Laboratory.
title: Roger Y. Tsien
